current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
For the relief of Anton Dodaj, Gjyljana Dodaj, Franc
		  Dodaj, and Kristjan Dodaj.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of law, for the
			 purposes of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, Anton
			 Dodaj, Gjyljana Dodaj, Franc Dodaj, and Kristjan Dodaj shall be deemed to have
			 been lawfully admitted to, and remained in, the United States, and shall be
			 eligible for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for
			 permanent residence under
upon filing an application for such adjustment of status.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 245 of the Immigration and Nationality Act

shall apply only if the
			 application for adjustment of status is filed with appropriate fees not later
			 than 2 years after the date of the enactment of this Act.

shall instruct the proper officer to reduce by 1, during the
			 current or next following fiscal year, the total number of immigrant visas that
